title: Rob Zombie's HALLOWEEN [Fanedit]
description:
What is this about? The "Halloween" remake re-cut to be closer to the original 1978 "Halloween"
what kind of fanedit (true fanedit = TF, extended edition = EE, special
 collection & preservation = SP): TF

tagline: The Night HE Came Home...

original film name: Rob Zombie&#039;s Halloween
new film name     : Rob Zombie&#039;s Halloween
film studio name  : Lionsgate
edit crew name    : Retro Horror Remix
Date Original Film Was Released : August, 2007
Date Edit Was Released		: Feb. 14th, 2008
Original Runtime		: Almost 2 hours
New Runtime			: 67 Minutes
Amount of time Cut/Added 	: Around 40 Minutes

Cuts removed/added/extended     : 

-The film opens with a re-created "HALLOWEEN" credit sequence which mimics the original 1978 version.
-We fade into Judith and her boyfriend making out. He leaves and Michael grabs the mask. Through the eyeholes of the mask, we see Judith lying on the bed. She notices Michael and yells at him. He stabs her.
-Michael grabs the baby and goes outside where his mother soon finds him. Fade out.
-We fade into Smith&#039;s Grove Sanitarium 10 years later. It is Michael&#039;s hearing. He is denied.
-Later that night Michael lets out of the inmates and kills both security guards, escaping.
-We then continue using the "re-shot" footage which recreates the original. 
-Many scenes have been altered to either remove bad dialogue, over-the-top acting or pacing.
-The scene with Lynda and her boyfriend has been moved to later in the film (about when it happens in the 1978 version).
-Michael has been removed from some scenes, and many murders have been deleted. 
-Ending altered slightly.
-"The Director&#039;s Cut" was used for the source so the death scenes shown are uncut, it features a couple extra homage scenes and that ending is the one used for this edit.

Fanedit details: This is a FULL DVD! Includes the film, and trailer with a menu and music.

Your intention for this fanedit: The focus was to keep true to the original 1978 Halloween. 

Your way to achieve your intention: Kept only the scenes which best represents the original Halloween.
